org.apache.hadoop.fs.viewfs

Class InodeTree.INodeLink<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.viewfs.InodeTree.INode<T>
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.viewfs.InodeTree.INodeLink<T>
  • Enclosing class:
    InodeTree<T>

    static class InodeTree.INodeLink<T>
extends InodeTree.INode<T>
    In internal class to represent a mount link A mount link can be single dir link or a merge dir link. A merge dir link is a merge (junction) of links to dirs: example : hdfs:nn1//users /users -> hdfs:nn2//users For a merge, each target is checked to be dir when created but if target is changed later it is then ignored (a dir with null entries)
